author: Nghi Huynh
comment: For those of you who are reporting issues on the LG G Watch R version, try rebooting your phone and watch. Once rebooted the app should install. You're welcome, interwebz
title: Requires restart on LG G Watch R

author: Scott Ohara
comment: Do any of the settings even work? Can't stop that annoying notification, even if I'm not using the face, selecting a channel doesn't do anything, they all seem random.  It's cool but needs some work, it's really just a watch face to demo for friends nothing more.  Going to uninstall cause of the notification

author: John Lahmeyer
comment: The app will suddenly stop working and I have to switch watch faces and go back to it on Moto 360. Sucks the watch battery too. Good idea if it worked. Uninstalled it.
title: Error

author: Nito Lugo
comment: Same gifs in rotation, doesn't seem to download new ones, can't make changes through phone app, watch UI is super clunky, doesn't allow to use own gifs, and takes up way too much storage. Cool idea implemented very badly.
title: Almost, but not quite.

author: Bill Murphy
comment: Expect to see the same images over and over and over. Clunky channel surfing.messages saying switch to WiFi. Fun for 10 minutes total
title: Cool idea, to little content, bad gui

author: sportsquid
comment: I use the app, but it keeps showing the same gifs. A few May change, but overall I am seeing the same ones over and over again. Also 90% of the time it just tells me syncing gifs.

reply.author: Little Labs, Inc.
reply.content: That's odd.  Sometimes it takes a few minutes to download all the GIFS.  In addition, they should refresh every hour.  If you're still seeing the issue, maybe uninstall and reinstall?  please email us at hello@little-labs.com and we'll help you figure it out.

reply.author: Little Labs, Inc.
reply.content: Thanks for the review and interesting idea!  We'll look into this for our next update.
